CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Photovoltaic devices were fabricated using PFDTBT , PFD2TBT and the ter-polymers as p - type electron donors and by using [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as an n - type acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT |
| PFD2TBT |
| ter-polymers |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) |

I have identified the following entities as "Material Name": PFDTBT, PFD2TBT, ter-polymers, and [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM). These entities are materials used in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Upon further review, I have identified the following entities as "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT |
| PFD2TBT |
| ter-polymers |
| PC71BM |

I have removed the parentheses and the word "acceptor" from the material name "PC71BM" as they are not part of the material's name. The material name "ter-polymers" is a general term for a type of polymer, but it is still a material name, so I have included it in the table.
